summary.span: 命名空間提供類別和介面，可讓您建立 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和 ASP.NET Web 網頁，以做為 ASP.NET Web 應用程式的使用者介面。

span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that enable you to create ASP.NET server controls and ASP.NET Web pages for the user interface of your ASP.NET Web applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空間包含類別，可提供一組常用功能的所有伺服器控制項，其中包含 HTML 伺服器控制項，Web 伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。This namespace includes the class, which provides a common set of functionality for all server controls, which includes HTML server controls, Web server controls, and user controls. 它也包含類別。It also includes the class. 每當針對.aspx 檔案中的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式提出要求時，會自動產生這個類別。This class is generated automatically whenever a request is made for an .aspx file in an ASP.NET Web application. 您可以繼承自兩個類別。You can inherit from both of these classes. 命名空間也包含伺服器控制項提供資料繫結的功能、 儲存檢視狀態的指定之控制項或頁面上，以及剖析功能的類別。The namespace also includes classes that provide the server controls with data-binding functionality, the ability to save the view state of a given control or page, and parsing functionality.
